website_summaries.verdict: Not only does this cart feature handsome metal and wood construction, but it has the space and components to fit your bottles, barware, and more.
pros: In addition to three large shelves, this cart features built-in wine glass and bottle holder racks so it's well-equipped for your home bar needs
Stylish, sturdy, and easy to assemble
cons: Some quality control issues noted, including screw holes that didn't line up
Wheels don't move very well over carpet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but defective
customer_reviews.text: I love this barcart. It is really beautiful. My only complaint is that the left side of the bar cart, top shelf screw brackets were messed up. The screws would not tighten. Because of this we thought we were using the wrong screw and used a longer screw from the pack which punctures through the top shelf. We have it held together with about 50% of the long screw jolting out but you can’t see it because it is under the shelf. It still made me frustrated because it’s damaged now after I paid full price. None of the other screw spaces had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy wine cart
customer_reviews.text: This wine cart was purchased as a Christmas present for my daughter. The instructions were easy to follow and It was super easy to put together. It’s large and very solid feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great amazon find!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! I will say it’s a bit smaller than I expected (width wise) and we removed the middle “wood” part due to glasses length but overall great buy, good price and it’s perfect for my apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I think the cart was defective. Wine bottles slide off, broke two bottles when they slipped off and hit ceramic floor. This was Xmas day and guests were coming in an hour! Box came damaged so had to pay 40 to have packed and returned. The Company contacted me and is going to reimburse the packing fee. I thought this was great customer service on their part. Not many companies have this kind of service. I will look at other items they have and will shop with them again. I see another person had the same issue with the wine bottles slidding off.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Good for extending your kitchen island...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent... only short-stemmed wine glasses fit. Otherwise, it has an amazing look.
customer_reviews.author: drP

customer_reviews.title: Great bar cart
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bar cart. It looks great and it was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great design and layout
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed mine. It's easy to assemble, sturdy, and looks really nice in the corner I fit it in. It's large surface allows for a lot of storage and the wine racks look better than any counter top option.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great bar cart, measure your wine glasses though!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bar cart! It was easy to assemble and looks like how I was expecting it to! They only con against it is that my wine glasses were too long to hang with the shelf on, we look it off and not they hang great! Just measure your glasses if it’s a concern!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Its Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart was well worth the wait, it took my husband about 45mins to put togther and it looks phenomenal and is extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: This item looked exactly as pictured and seems to be great quality for the cost. My glassware hung a bit long so I left the second shelf off and it worked great. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this cart, which I am using for a combination coffee bar/wine cart. It's well made and looks great! I was able to assemble by myself, even though instructions recommended two people.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rhyne

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up for one person. I had an issue with my wine glasses being too small and the company reached out and informed me on how to hang them from the back.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha Jones

customer_reviews.title: Mid Shelf too short for regular wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: This product is great - it is a great value and sturdy product. The one downside is the space between the top and second shelf, either you have to remove the mid shelf or buy short wine glasses. While this isn’t a big deal it would be great if this was referenced on the page so customers had a heads up :)
customer_reviews.author: Karleigh Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with how easy this was to assemble. My 78 year old husband and I (75) put it together in an hour. It was very well marked and the instructions were very easy to follow. The cart is very sturdy. We bought this cart for entertaining in our family room.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyB

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Assembly wasn’t too bad with 2 people! Fits our wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly not very difficult to put together. All of the pieces had numbers and the instructions had pictures which simplified the process. The shelves are a heavy strong material that I don't think will get ruined easy.
customer_reviews.author: ERIN COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my living room. I was ablw to assemble it by myself in about 30 to 45 minutes. Instructions were very clear and cart looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Nuage Perdu

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Easy assembly, sturdy and looks great
customer_reviews.author: joanne marcakis

customer_reviews.title: So cute and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: So worth it for the price. My only issue was the wood shelves didn’t quite match up to the holes but it was an easy fix on our end. Have gotten lots of complements and it fits all of my wine glasses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice cart. We really like it. It looks great and its quite sturdy. Only complaint is the bottle holder hangers are the same height so the bottles tip down a bit, so shorter bottles fall right off at the back.
customer_reviews.author: Mgrffn

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to display my cool decanters. Look great in my home!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product was super easy to put together, we put all the wine, wine glasses and other alcohol bottles on it and it holds them all perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great price, easy to assemble, great design! It looks just like the picture and is the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cart for the price! Reviews are accurate
customer_reviews.text: Nice cart. Reviews are correct for larger wine glasses and champagne bottles don’t fit in the bottle holes. Locks are only on two wheels and not super tight. Assembly is easy but as most furniture not always a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Golzar

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, item is what it shows
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for daughter. Husband put it together prior to giving it to her. Easy to assemble, used own tools, not what was in item. Very sturdy, item is as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Whisker

customer_reviews.title: Love my bar cart!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bar cart! So easy to assemble and fits my coffee and also my wines and it even fits my board games underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Arceri

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming and a hassle to build
customer_reviews.text: Ended up looking like a nice piece but not well made. Missing proper tools for building and had to improvise attaching all three of the shelf pieces. Would not say the price justifies the quality or the hassle of putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Fun and inexpensive bar cart
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty and functional! I will use it a ton when I entertain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions
customer_reviews.text: Right size. Use it for serving cart in dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbijo

customer_reviews.title: Rustic and classy
customer_reviews.text: Love my bar cart! I get so many compliments on this cart. It is well made, and I was able to put it together by myself easily. The cart is sturdy and captures the look of rustic but classy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great rack and my girlfriend absolutely loved it for her birthday
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished putting this together and the last piece, the top piece is missing the required holes to assemble...NOT A HAPPY CAMPER
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love our drink cart! Only thing I would change is that it only holds medium size wine glasses, we couldn’t add our fav glasses. Other than that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kanchan

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Does not look cheap! It is very sturdy and the wood finish is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great first bar!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my 21 year old daughter her first bar. She loves it and gets so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Service after the sale.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the cart. It’s a Christmas gift for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wine bottle slip and fall out of racks
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I'm not sure if my cart is faulty or if this is the standard design but the wine racks do not hold wine bottle's...they slip and fall out. It appears that the racks in the main photo here on amazon are closer together than the racks on my cart. The distance is too far apart causing the bottle's to slip through. The wheels are also very tiny and not ideal for carpet...actually it barely rolls on a low carpet. The other detail you should be aware of is that the wood is more like particle board material. If the wine racks actually held the bottle's I wouldn't mind this product but as of now I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McEathron

product_meta.title: HOMYSHOPY Industrial Bar Cart with Wine Rack and Glass Holder, Mobile Wine Carts with Wheels for The Home, Metal Serving Cart and Kitchen Storage Cart 3 Shelves, Vintage Brown
feature_bullets: MOBILE BAR CART --- This wine cart equipped with 2 handle bars and 4 rolling casters (2 of them are lockable), make it easy to move.

SPACIOUS STORAGE --- Overall Size: 42.5"W x 16.1"D x 33.7"H. Three shelves provide more space for trays, snacks and other small items. In addition, the kitchen cart built in with glass holders and wine racks.
STURDY CONSTRUCTION --- Crafted in metal frame construction for increased durability as well as ensure the shelves on this buffet cart can hold a considerable amount of weight.
INDUSTRIAL STYLE --- The mixed materials of MDF board and iron frame create a rustic industrial flair, is a timeless trendy for kitchens and dining rooms.
EASY ASSEMBLY --- With instruction and all necessary hardware included, you will never get stuck with the assembly jobs for the serving cart.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
